room_title: Escape room "Dr. Fratelli's Cabin" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: Escape Artist Greenville is hands down my favorite escape room company! I have been to four other escape rooms in Asheville, and one in Charlotte, and this was the best of all of them. The puzzles are clever and fun, the staff was friendly and helpful (Luke is the man!!!), and the room was very well put together and slick-looking. I will absolutely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Fratelli's Cabin" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: It was our first time in an escape room and we did Dr. Fratelli's Cabin. We had a great time and are looking forward to The Fallout!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Fratelli's Cabin" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: Had an awesome time doing Dr Fratelli's Cabin with amazing friends/family. Thanks to our very welcoming clue master Emma for making it a little easier.

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Fratelli's Cabin" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: This was my first time doing an escape room. Dr. Fratelli's Cabin was so awesome. We finished in 56 minutes. Alex was a great host. Top notch and highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Fratelli's Cabin" by Escape Artist Greenville in Greenville
review: Dr. Fratelli's escape room was my 7th escape room, and my favorite! There is a world of difference between the independently owned and the franchise outfits. The puzzles were unique and the design was outstanding. The customer service provided by Alex was perfection. The owner and employees are passionate about what they do and it really comes across throughout the whole experience.
